ygData.subject: RE: Levels after hell levels
ygData.msgSnippet: ... But like I said, my L31 death that caused the huge exp drop into 30 was to a red zealot.  My L47 death that caused the (relatively) minor drop into 46 was
ygData.messageBody:
On Thu, 24 Feb 2000, Adam Wasserman wrote:
>
> If I had to guess, I would also think that the mob's level relative to the
> player was a factor as well.
>
> Thus if a mob is higher level than you, you lose less exp, and if a mob is
> lower level than you you lose more exp. Also, based on the exp needed to

But like I said, my L31 death that caused the huge exp drop
into 30 was to a red zealot. My L47 death that caused the
(relatively) minor drop into 46 was to a green fanatic.

--
John H. Kim
